column4: Could anyone tell me how to find a digitial camera from the command line?
aha! I see it! Any idea on how to get to it? All I get is an id
does nautilus see the cam, when you plugged it in?
ok, what was your initial question again?
click on it in nautilus, what happens
look in /media to see if it's there
what's /media/STORAGE i guess it's what you want
I have a temporary solution using gphoto2, gphoto2 -p <file> downloads it
